verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4427>reigns!<s%> Let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice!<s%> Let the <S%H7227>multitude<s%> of <S%H339>islands<s%> be <S%H8055>glad!<s%>
<S%H6051>Clouds<s%> and <S%H6205>darkness<s%> are <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H6664>him.<s%> Righteousness and <S%H4941>justice<s%> are the <S%H4349>foundation<s%> of his <S%H3678>throne.<s%>
A <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3212>goes<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3857>him,<s%> and burns up his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> on every <S%H5439>side.<s%>

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H4549>melt<s%> like <S%H1749>wax<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth.<s%>
The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%> All the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> his <S%H3519>glory.<s%>
Let all them be <S%H954>shamed<s%> who <S%H5647>serve<s%> engraved <S%H6459>images,<s%> who <S%H1984>boast<s%> in their <S%H457>idols.<s%> <S%H7812>Worship<s%> <S%H430>him,<s%> all you gods!
<S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> and was <S%H8055>glad.<s%> The <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1523>rejoiced,<s%> because of your <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
For <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, are most high <S%H5945>above<s%> all the <S%H776>earth.<s%> You are <S%H5927>exalted<s%> far <S%H3966>above<s%> all <S%H430>gods.<s%>

You who <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7451>evil.<s%> He <S%H8104>preserves<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of his <S%H2623>saints.<s%> He <S%H5337>delivers<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
<S%H216>Light<s%> is <S%H2232>sown<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness<s%> for the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
Be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H3034>people!<s%> Give thanks to his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2143>Name.<s%>
